author: ahinzmann
body:
Backport of #7649
SoftKiller is a general pileup removal algorithm.
This pull request enables using packedCandidates instead of PFCandidates as input, such that it can be run on MiniAOD.
The same strategy to handle both inputs as in the PUPPI pileup algorithm is used.
title: Allow SoftKiller to run on packed candidates
